related_product_name: Zazen Bear Tea Spoon & Dessert Fork
description: Our Zazen Bear ceramic cutlery series adds a little Zen to any serving plate. These teaspoons are offered with two types of handles. The Solid handle fills out the shape of Zazen Bear while the Contour handle offers a delicate outline of the shape. Both types come as a two piece set and are packaged in a special gift box. These are the perfect match for Zazen Bear mugs. Please handle with care.
